mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customerInfo(customerName, businessName, customerManagerName, customerPhoneNumber, customerZipCode, customerAddress, customerFullAddress, customerDept, employeeSeName, employeeSalesName, productCheck, tosmsVer, tosrfVer, portalVer, javaVer, webServerVer, databaseVer, logServerVer, scvEaVer, scvCaVer, authPkiVer, customerInfoRegistrant, customerInfoRegistrationDate) VALUES(#{customerName}, #{businessName}, #{customerManagerName}, #{customerPhoneNumber}, #{customerZipCode}, #{customerAddress}, #{customerFullAddress}, #{customerDept}, #{employeeSeName}, #{employeeSalesName}, #{productCheck}, #{tosmsVer}, #{tosrfVer}, #{portalVer}, #{javaVer}, #{webServerVer}, #{databaseVer}, #{logServerVer}, #{scvEaVer}, #{scvCaVer}, #{authPkiVer}, #{customerInfoRegistrant}, #{customerInfoRegistrationDate});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM customerInfo WHERE customerName = #{customerName} AND businessName = #{businessName};
